slide.title: Adding a review

div.example:
<?php
$m = new MongoClient;
$c = $m->demo->whisky;

$newReview = [
    user_name => "Michael",
    date => new MongoDate(strtotime("2013-10-01")),
    note => "No peat, but fruity",
    rating => 1,
];

$c->update(
    [ 'name' => 'Glenfiddich 15' ],
    [ '$push => [ 'notes' => $newReview ] ]
);
?>
